Title: Episode #5.8
Writer: Chris Ryan (based on the book by), Jack Lothian, Ed Whitmore
Actors: Philip Winchester, William Brand, Christopher Goh, Jane May Graves
Plot: Scott and Stonebridge chase Li-Na and Kwon and attempt to rescue Pirogova. Locke encounters "Oppenheimer" again and must decide his fate. Scott and Stonebridge discover Li-Na and Kwon's intended target with codes.
